activities: DaVita will use and otherwise process personal data about employees and independent contractors/service providers in the EU (collectively, “EU Personnel” and “EU Personnel Data”) in the United States for the following purposes: Workflow management, such as assigning, managing, and administering projects; Compensation administration, including stock plan administration, compensation analysis, and benchmarking; Payroll processing; Performance management; Succession planning; Benefits and personnel administration, such as: Health and medical benefits, Leave entitlements, Bonuses, and Pensions; IT helpdesk and support services; Monitoring and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures, including administration of the employee hotline; Administering learning and development programs; Addressing immigration requirements; Completing background checks; and Monitoring licenses.
contacttitle1: Vice President, People Services and Teammate Safety
personaldata: Employee and independent contractor/service provider personal data.
